snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner finds himself at a crossroads: an imminent financial default on the one hand, and on the other an unyielding conservative rank and file.
abstract: House Speaker John A Boehner, after failed effort to unite his caucus, finds himself at crossroads between imminent financial default and unyielding conservative rank and file that persists in futile effort to take down Pres Obama's health care law; Boehner's efforts to resolve crisis within next 48 hours may prove to be biggest test of his career and determine his future within the Republican party.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and JEREMY W. PETERS

lead_paragraph: Speaker John A. Boehner finds himself at a crossroads: an imminent financial default on the one hand, and on the other an unyielding conservative rank and file.

headline.main: With G.O.P. Badly Divided, Boehner Is Left ‘Herding Cats’
headline.print_headline: With G.O.P. Badly Divided, Boehner Is Left ‘Herding Cats’

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
